revised_title: Léon Edmond Marion: A Pioneering Chemist and Administrator
tldr: Léon Edmond Marion was a pioneering chemist and administrator who made significant contributions to the field of chemistry, particularly in the study of alkaloids and natural products. He played a crucial role in the growth of science in Canada, working at the National Research Council and later as a dean at the University of Ottawa. His dedication to excellence and support for young researchers helped shape the Canadian scientific landscape.
